verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You have been given the Name above all names,
And we worship You, yes, we worship You.
You have been given the Name above all names,
And we worship You, yes, we worship You

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We are Your people, made for Your glory,
And we worship You, yes, we worship You.
We are Your people, made for Your glory
And we worship You, yes, we worship You

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You have redeemed us from every nation,
And we worship You, yes, we worship You.
You have redeemed us from every nation
And we worship You, yes, we worship You.
